The Dale Deal:

Hostress.net is currently providing a never seen before offer with a unique twist. Every 10th order is FREE! Yes, you have read that correctly. Every 10th order from a VPSBoard Reader is FREE,for the initial term they selected. This is valid on any term you can order on the website. I will announce (with permission of the customer) every order that has been made free. You will have your choice of either a FULL REFUND or ACCOUNT CREDIT to keep your services going.
